scripts.deploy: npm run build && aws s3 sync dist/ s3://hp-bucket-2025 --delete
scripts.configure-bucket: npm run allow-public-access && aws s3 website s3://hp-bucket-2025 --index-document index.html && aws s3api put-bucket-policy --bucket hp-bucket-2025 --policy '{"Version":"2012-10-17","Statement":[{"Sid":"PublicReadGetObject","Effect":"Allow","Principal":"*","Action":"s3:GetObject","Resource":"arn:aws:s3:::hp-bucket-2025/*"}]}'
scripts.setup: npm run create-bucket && npm run configure-bucket
